languages.text: The first instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} reduces the inflicted enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% until the end of combat. This effect can be inflicted on multiple enemies per round, but only once per enemy. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: All Executioner's DoT effects, when dealing damage, reduce enemy's Armour by {uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}%. Applies once on each enemy each round.

The first instance of damage inflicted by any Executioner's damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} in a round to each enemy reduces that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% until the end of combat. Stacks.

The first instance of damage inflicted by any Executioner's damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} in a round to each enemy reduces that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% until the end of combat. Stacks.

The first instance of damage dealt by the Executioner's damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} in a round reduces the inflicted enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% until the end of combat. This effect can be inflicted on multiple enemies per round, but only once per enemy. Stacks.

The first instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} reduces the inflicted enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% until the end of combat. This effect can be inflicted on multiple enemies per round, but only once per enemy. Stacks.

languages.text: La primera instancia de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que infligen los efectos de daño continuado del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del enemigo afligido un −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca} % hasta el final del combate. Este efecto se puede aplicar a varios enemigos por asalto, pero solo una vez por enemigo. Es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: The first instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} reduces the inflicted enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% until the end of combat. This effect can be inflicted on multiple enemies per round, but only once per enemy. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: La primera instancia de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que infligen los efectos de daño continuado del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del enemigo afligido un −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca} % hasta el final del combate. Este efecto se puede aplicar a varios enemigos por asalto, pero solo una vez por enemigo. Es acumulativo.

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中に{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の継続ダメージ効果で与えられた最初の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、戦闘が終了するまで、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を−{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}％減少させる。この効果は1ラウンドに複数の敵に与えることができるが、1体の敵に対して1回のみである。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: The first instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} reduces the inflicted enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% until the end of combat. This effect can be inflicted on multiple enemies per round, but only once per enemy. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中に{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の継続ダメージ効果で与えられた最初の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、戦闘が終了するまで、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を−{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}％減少させる。この効果は1ラウンドに複数の敵に与えることができるが、1体の敵に対して1回のみである。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的持续伤害效果首次造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，会使受影响的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果每回合可对多名敌人触发，但每个敌人只能触发一次。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: The first instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} reduces the inflicted enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% until the end of combat. This effect can be inflicted on multiple enemies per round, but only once per enemy. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的持续伤害效果首次造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，会使受影响的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果每回合可对多名敌人触发，但每个敌人只能触发一次。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Die erste Instanz {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch den Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekt des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des betroffenen Gegners bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca} %. Dieser Effekt kann auf mehrere Gegner pro Runde angewandt werden, auf jeden Gegner aber nur einmal. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: The first instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} reduces the inflicted enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% until the end of combat. This effect can be inflicted on multiple enemies per round, but only once per enemy. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Die erste Instanz {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch den Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekt des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des betroffenen Gegners bis zum Ende des Kampfes um -{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca} %. Dieser Effekt kann auf mehrere Gegner pro Runde angewandt werden, auf jeden Gegner aber nur einmal. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, la première instance de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par les effets de dégâts progressifs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de l'ennemi affecté de −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet effet peut être infligé à plusieurs ennemis au cours d'un même round, mais une fois par ennemi seulement. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: The first instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} reduces the inflicted enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% until the end of combat. This effect can be inflicted on multiple enemies per round, but only once per enemy. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, la première instance de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par les effets de dégâts progressifs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de l'ennemi affecté de −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet effet peut être infligé à plusieurs ennemis au cours d'un même round, mais une fois par ennemi seulement. Cumulable.

languages.text: Когда противник впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} получает периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от наложенного {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачом{/g} эффекта, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} этого противника уменьшается на {uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% до конца боя. Этот эффект может быть применен к нескольким врагам за раунд, но не более одного раза к каждому врагу. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: The first instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s damage-over-time effects in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} reduces the inflicted enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% until the end of combat. This effect can be inflicted on multiple enemies per round, but only once per enemy. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Когда противник впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} получает периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от наложенного {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачом{/g} эффекта, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} этого противника уменьшается на {uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% до конца боя. Этот эффект может быть применен к нескольким врагам за раунд, но не более одного раза к каждому врагу. Эффект суммируется.

Когда противник впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} получает периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от наложенного {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачом{/g} эффекта, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} этого противника уменьшается на {uip|Armour|01af61c681bb4abd86368fc07563aaca}% до конца боя. Этот эффект может быть применен к нескольким врагам за раунд, но не более одного раза к каждому врагу. Эффект суммируется.
